item.description:
We have been invited to the Policeman's Post (at American Legion Hwy & Morton St)
for a Birthday Party and to Celebrate the Reception of his Doctorate Degree for Mr. Poncho Brown.

9pm to 1am
Cash Bar

This is private affair, so please RSVP. No Cover
This is an opportunity to Step.

This is not a Boston Steps event.

The Veterans of Foreign Wars Post 1018 is located at the corner of Morton Street, Canterbury Street, and American Legion Highway.

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: We have been invited to the Policeman's Post # 1018 - 5/7/10
